item.description:
What's New

  • Created Apple Help Book.
  • Created Sparkle Updater to check for new updates.
  • Minor coding improvements.
  • Application contains current Historical Data to place into User's Application Document Folder for New User.
  • Application verifies User's Application Document Folder exists with current User Historical Data before making any changes to User's Application Document Folder.
  • Application will not over-ride User's Historical Data in the User's Application Document Folder.
  • Application will update to the Current Version when the User requests an update.
